channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- XClarity Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- XClarity Controller

item.title: CVE-2023-0683|2024-08-02T05:17:50.317Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid, authenticated XCC user with read only access may gain elevated privileges through a specifically crafted API call.

item.title: CVE-2024-38509|2024-07-27T17:21:01.331Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted IPMI command.

item.title: CVE-2024-38512|2024-07-27T17:16:58.109Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-38511|2024-07-27T17:19:56.955Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in an upload processing functionality of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38510|2024-07-27T17:20:24.112Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the SSH captive command shell interface that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38508|2024-07-27T17:21:36.848Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the web interface or SSH captive command shell interface of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38508|2024-07-26T19:44:50.100Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the web interface or SSH captive command shell interface of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-38510|2024-07-26T19:45:12.150Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the SSH captive command shell interface that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in an upload processing functionality of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted IPMI command.

item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the web interface or SSH captive command shell interface of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via a specially crafted request.
